showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“It sure is raining hard.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cloud}
“Hey, how are you doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Cloud}
“I wouldn't know…”{PAUSE}“I've never had motion sickness.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Cloud}
“They gave me some new Materia.”{PAUSE}“I can't wait to use it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Cloud}
“You going to brief us
about this mission?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cloud}
“I joined SOLDIER
to be like you.”{PAUSE}“But by the time I made First Class,
the war was already over.”{PAUSE}“My big hopes of becoming a hero
like you ended with the war.”{PAUSE}“That's why I always sign up
whenever there's a big mission.
Kind of a way to prove myself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Cloud}
“Say, how do you feel,
MISTER Sephiroth?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // Sephiroth
“…Just like a kid.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Sephiroth
“This isn't a typical
mission.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Sephiroth
“Why do you say that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Sephiroth
“…I thought you wanted
a briefing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Sephiroth
“Our mission is to investigate
an old Mako reactor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Sephiroth
“There have been reports of
it malfunctioning,
and producing brutal creatures.”{PAUSE}“First, we will dispose of those
creatures.
Then, we'll locate the problem
and neutralize it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Sephiroth
“The Mako Reactor at Nibelheim.”

dialogStrings:
“It's the Planet.
It takes years to make.”

{Cloud}
“I wouldn't know…”{PAUSE}“I've never had motion sickness.”

{Cloud}
“They gave me some new Materia.”{PAUSE}“I can't wait to use it.”

{Cloud}
“You going to brief us
about this mission?”

{Cloud}
“I joined SOLDIER
to be like you.”{PAUSE}“But by the time I made First Class,
the war was already over.”{PAUSE}“My big hopes of becoming a hero
like you ended with the war.”{PAUSE}“That's why I always sign up
whenever there's a big mission.
Kind of a way to prove myself.”

{Cloud}
“Say, how do you feel,
MISTER Sephiroth?”

Sephiroth
“…I thought you wanted
a briefing?”

Sephiroth
“Our mission is to investigate
an old Mako reactor.”

Sephiroth
“There have been reports of
it malfunctioning,
and producing brutal creatures.”{PAUSE}“First, we will dispose of those
creatures.
Then, we'll locate the problem
and neutralize it.”

“Sir…s, something strange
just crashed into the truck!”

Sephiroth
“Come on, let's go to work.”
